meanings.definition: Pleasingly graceful and stylish in appearance or manner.
meanings.sent1: She wore an elegant dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The ballerina's movements were elegant and beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked with an elegant swagger, pretending to be a royal feline.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in elegant hues of pink and gold.
meanings.sent5: The old mansion had an elegant charm that captivated all who visited.

meanings.definition: Characterized by refined taste and sophistication.
meanings.sent1: The elegant dinner party was attended by the city's elite.
meanings.sent2: Her elegant manners impressed everyone at the event.
meanings.sent3: The penguin waddled around the ice rink with an elegant grace, surprising the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: His words were as elegant as a well-crafted poem, leaving a lasting impact on the audience.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed an elegant collection of priceless artifacts from ancient civilizations.

meanings.definition: Simple and clever in design or execution.
meanings.sent1: The elegant solution to the problem saved them hours of work.
meanings.sent2: The elegant design of the new smartphone made it a bestseller.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel devised an elegant plan to outsmart the clever fox.
meanings.sent4: Her elegant use of colors in the painting created a striking visual effect.
meanings.sent5: The chef's elegant twist on the classic dish impressed even the toughest food critics.
